      • createBackgroundService

        public void createBackgroundService()
                             throws OtherServiceStillRunningException
        Creates a background service which operates in the background and gets called from time to time by the system This causes low battery drain but also the refresh rate is low Also this will NOT! send to CISPA because of too low accuracy
        Throws:
        OtherServiceStillRunningException - if an old service is still running. Stop old service first before creating a new one

      • createForegroundService

        public void createForegroundService(android.app.Notification foregroundNotification)
                             throws OtherServiceStillRunningException
        Creates a service which also operates in background but will never go asleep thus your app stays in foreground This causes huge battery drain but also gives a very good refresh rate
        Parameters:
        foregroundNotification - this is needed because we need to display a permanent notification if tracking should run as foreground service You can use ForegroundNotification.parse() for this type of notification
        Throws:
        OtherServiceStillRunningException - if an old service is still running. Stop old service first before creating a new one

      • start

        public void start(android.app.Activity activity)
        Starts the service and asks user to turn on bluetooth and GPS Service then will start even if bluetooth is turned off and will work after they are turned on later
        Parameters:
        activity - The application activity. Here the message will be displayed to turn on location an bluetooth

      • startWithoutChecks

        public void startWithoutChecks()
        Tries to start the service even if GPS and bluetooth is not turned on This in normal case is not the best idea. Service then will start do work if bluetooth is turned on and gps too

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops the service

      • isRunning

        public boolean isRunning()
        Indicates if the services is running
        Returns:
        true if service is running

      • setActivity

        public void setActivity(android.app.Activity activity)
        Sets the Activity. Should be called in every Activity.onResume()
        Parameters:
        activity -
